ANRR.message:
1. Entry of a drunk person is prohibited otherwise tickets money will not be refunded.
2. Outside Food and Beverage is not allowed inside the cinema premises.
3. Ticket required for children 3 years and above.
4. Tickets for A rated movie should not be purchased for people under 18 years of age. There won`t be a refund for tickets booked in such cases.
5. Tickets once purchased cannot be exchanged or adjusted/transferred for any other show.
6. Handbags, Laptops, Tabs, cameras and all other electronic items are not allowed inside cinema premises.
7. Smoking is strictly not permitted inside the cinema premises.Cigarettes, lighters, matchsticks, Gutkha, Pan masala etc. will not be allowed.
8. People under the influence of Alcohol and Drugs will not be allowed inside the cinema premises.
9. Cinema reserves the Right of Admission.
10. Items like laptop, cameras, knives, lighter, match box, cigarettes, firearms and all types of inflammable objects are strictly prohibited.
11. Items like carry-bags, eatables, helmets, handbags are not allowed inside the theatres and are strictly prohibited.
12. In case the ticket is lost or misplaced, a duplicate ticket will not be issued.
13. Decision(s) taken by management is final & abiding.

INZS.message:
1. Entry is allowed only for valid ticket holders.
2. Guests aged under 18 will not be allowed in `A` rated movies
3. Children above the age of 3 years require tickets for `U` or `U/A` rated movies.
4. In case a ticket is lost or misplaced, a duplicate ticket cannot be issued.
5. Tickets once purchased cannot be exchanged or adjusted/transferred for any other show.
6. Guest Agrees to be contacted by INOX Management for the purpose of seeking feedback for service improvement.
7. Decision(s) taken by INOX shall be final and binding, Rights of admission reserved.
8. Outside food and beverages are not allowed inside the cinema premises.
9. Patrons under the influence of alcohol or drugs will not be allowed inside the Cinema Premises.
10. Ticket prices and movie schedules are subject to change without any prior notification.

JUGA.message:
1. This cinema has free seating, seats will be allocated on a first-come-first-serve basis.
2. Tickets are compulsory for children of 3 years & above.
3. Patrons below the age of 18 Years cannot be admitted for movies certified A.
4. Outside food & Beverage are not allowed in the cinema premises.
5. Items like carry-bags, eatable, helmets, handbags are not allowed inside the theatres and are strictly prohibited.
6. Items like laptops, camera, knives, lighter, match box, cigarettes, firearms, and all types of inflammable objects are strictly prohibited.
7. Patrons under the influence of alcohol or any other form of drugs will not be allowed inside the cinema premises.
8. Tickets once purchased cannot be cancelled, exchange or refunded.
9. Decision(s) taken by the Management shall be final and binding, rights of reserved.
10. Ticket prices are subject to change without any prior notification.
11. Recording of a film through mobile or camera is strictly prohibited and is a punishable offence.

MCGP.message:
Please follow the Covid guidelines (As per the directions from your local authority).
1. Outside Food and Beverage is not allowed inside the cinema premises.
2. Ticket required for child 3 years and above.
3. Ticket for ``A`` rated movie should not be purchased for people under 18 years of age. There won`t be a refund for tickets booked in such cases.
4. Ticket once purchased cannot be exchanged or adjusted/transferred for any other show.
5. Handbags, Laptops, Tabs, cameras and all other electronic items are not allowed inside cinema premises.
6. Smoking is strictly not permitted inside the cinema premises. Cigarettes, lighters, matchsticks, Gutkha, Pan masala etc. will not be allowed.
7. People under the influence of Alcohol and Drugs will not be allowed inside the cinema premises.
8. Items like laptop, cameras, knives, lighter, match box , cigarettes, firearms and all types of inflammable objects are strictly prohibited.
9. Items like carry-bags eatables , helmets , handbags are not allowed inside the theatres and are strictly prohibited.
10. For 3D movies, ticket price includes charges towards usage of 3D glasses.
11. Incase the ticket is lost or misplaced, duplicate ticket will not be issued.
12. Cinema Reserves the Right of Admission.
13. Decision(s) taken by Miraj management is final & abiding.

MCRL.message:
1. Person below the age of 18 years cannot be admitted for movies certified `A.
2. Tickets are compulsory for children of 3 years & above.
3. Items like laptops, cameras, knives, lighter, match box, cigarettes, firearms and all types of inflammable objects are strictly prohibited.
4. Items like carry-bags, eatables, helmets, handbags are not allowed inside the theatres and are strictly prohibited. Kindly deposit at the baggage counter of the mall/cinema.
5. For 3D movies, ticket price includes charges towards usage of 3D glasses.
6. Seat Layout Page for Movietime Cinemas is for representational purpose only and actual seat layout might vary.
7. The Cinema Reserves The Right Of Admission.
8. Tickets once purchased cannot be cancelled, exchanged, refunded, adjusted, and transferred for any other shows.
9. Screenshots or forwarded messages will not be accepted during the entry at the Cinema.
10. In case the ticket is lost or Misplaced, Duplicate tickets will not be issued.
11. Patrons under the influence of alcohol or any other form of drugs will not be allowed inside the cinema premises.
12. Pre-booked food & beverage needs to be collected from the F & B counter.
13. Ticket prices are subject to change without any prior notification.
14. Please follow the covid guidelines (As per the directions from your local authority).

NYCH.message:
1.Tickets once purchased are non-refundable and are not available for exchange and cancellation.
2.A convenience fee per ticket is levied on all tickets booked online.
3.Tickets purchased for cinema is valid for that cinema only.
4.To counter unforeseen delays, tickets should be collected half an hour before show time.
5.Show timings are subject to change.
6.Ticket is compulsory for children of 3 years & above.
7.Patrons below the age of 18 years cannot be admitted for movies certified A.
8.Outside food & beverages will not be allowed inside the Cinema premises.
9.Food orders once placed cannot be cancelled.
10.No replacement/compensation is permissible on loss of ticket. Mutilated or defaced ticket will not be accepted.
11.Smoking, drinking alcohol and chewing of pan is strictly prohibited inside the cinema premises.
12.Patrons under the influence of alcohol or any other form of drugs will not be allowed inside the cinema premises.
13.Items like carry bags, eatables, helmets, handbags are not allowed inside the cinema premises and are strictly prohibited.
14.Items like laptops, camera, knives, lighter, match box, cigarettes, firearms, and all types of inflammables, unsafe or hazardous objects are strictly prohibited.
15.Baggage counter facility for patrons is not available at the cinema premises, inconvenience caused is deeply regretted.
16.The management will not be responsible for the loss or damage of any personal property.
17.The 3D glasses will be available at the cinema for 3D films and must be returned by patrons before exiting the cinema premises. For 3D movies, ticket price includes charges towards usage of 3D glasses and is non-refundable.
18.Decision(s) taken by NY Cinemas shall be final and binding, ``rights of admission reserved``.
19.Terms and Conditions are subject to change.

8. Items like laptops, camera, knives, lighter, match box, cigarettes, firearms and all types of inflammable objects are strictly prohibited.
9. Patrons under the influence of alcohol or any other form of drugs will not be allowed inside the cinema premises.
10. In case a ticket is lost or misplaced, a duplicate ticket cannot be issued.
11. Tickets once purchased cannot be exchanged or adjusted/transferred for any other show.
12. Decision(s) taken by PVR cinema shall be final and binding, ``rights of reserved``.
13. Pre-booked food & beverage needs to be collected from F&B counter.
14. Ticket prices are subject to change without any prior notification.
15. Recording of a film through mobile or camera is strictly prohibited and is a punishable offence.
